translations: n．堕落者，道德败坏的人：品行不端、道德败坏的人。
· The town was full of reprobates and criminals.
这个城镇充满了堕落者和罪犯。
v．谴责，指责：对某人的行为表示强烈的不满或不赞同。

sentences.sentence: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates.
sentences.translation: 我却相信你们晓得，我们不是可弃绝的人。

sentences.sentence: But I trust that all of you shall know that we are not reprobates.
sentences.translation: 我却相信你们晓得，我们不是可弃绝的人。

sentences.sentence: Several notorious fiscal reprobates are promising Angela Merkel that they will whip themselves into line.
sentences.translation: 一些臭名昭著的财政官员向安吉拉•默克尔保证他们会努力将经济状况恢复正常。
